remarks: Extend a finite group sum by padding outside with zeroes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsumzres as of 31-May-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumzclOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumzclOLD.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumzclOLD.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzclOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzclOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumzclOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumzclOLD.c $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumzresOLD.s $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) C_ W ) $.
gsumzresOLD.w $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumzresOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( F |` W ) ) = ( G gsum F ) ) $.
